content:
Head coach Lincoln Riley walks on the field during overtime at the game against Army Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

Armys coach Jeff Monken sat before the media just moments earlier his Black Knights were closing in on what would have been one of the biggest upsets in college football PERIOD

But they came up short falling  to No PERIOD  Oklahoma in Norman PERIOD Monken opened his postgame press conference in awe of the Sooners success PERIOD

 Monken said PERIOD 

Simultaneously Lincoln Riley also addressed the media trying to explain why he and his team struggled Saturday night PERIOD Ironically while Monken praised Oklahoma for its success in recent history Riley spoke about the future and what itll take for his team to continue that success Monken spoke so highly of PERIOD

 Riley said PERIOD 

Saturday showed just how tough the rest of Oklahomas remaining schedule will be PERIOD

Texas Tech stomped Oklahoma State on the road Texas may actually be back after beating TCU and West Virginia looked like the best team in the conference with its win over Kansas State PERIOD

But one thing remains constant the Big  runs through Norman PERIOD And Oklahoma while the last two weeks have been a struggle showed Saturday night theyre never going to be an easy outing PERIOD

 Riley said PERIOD 

 redshirt junior defensive lineman Neville Gallimore said PERIOD 

Gallimore and Oklahomas defense showed signs of vulnerability against Army  a lack of tackling was the biggest takeaway PERIOD

But they also showed resiliency PERIOD The Sooners forced two big turnovers  one before and one in overtime  that eventually sealed the game PERIOD Those plays were far and few between last year PERIOD

And defensive coordinator Mike Stoops yes the same Mike Stoops that some want fired had his team in position to make those plays PERIOD

 Stoops said PERIOD Weve got to play better PERIOD We will play better PERIOD I love this team PERIOD Were courageous too PERIOD I couldnt be more proud of these guys to fight through this.You could have hung our heads and that would have affected us but in that moment you cant do that in that momentWe stayed locked in PERIOD Coach Riley called us all in and told us we have worked that situation many of times and I think that showed PERIOD We got the win and I am really proud of the guys PERIOD

title: OU football: The Sooners' resiliency, fight in their win over Army shows promise for future | Sports | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
